text: Thomas Paul Patrick Knox (November 23, 1933 â€“ August 24, 2022) was a Canadian professional ice hockey right winger. He played in one National Hockey League game for the Toronto Maple Leafs from 1954 to 1955. He won the bronze medal for Canada at the 1956 Winter Olympics. Knox died on August 24, 2022 in Southampton, Canada at the age of 88.Paul Knox obituary ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players Category:Ice hockey people from Toronto Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Canada
title: Paul Knox
